title: [BUG] Navigation Bar Redirects to EUW
body: While on a boards page, pressing the Boards button on the top-most navigation bar (with the intention of returning to Boards home) redirects to the EUW boards home.

replies.body: The funny thing is, this just happened to me as I was trying to post a response to this, and it was because I was just on the EUW Boards page. The way the system works is it will save your region preference based on the last page you visited. If you could verify that this isn't what is happening and that you are getting redirected regardless, then I can escalate this.

Don't know if it's related, but since the start of the boards, if I'm on EUW english and want to go on EUW french boards, it bug and keep me on the english side of the boards (must go elswhere like for exemple, champion page, to manage to switch langage and then be able to go to french boards :s)

edit: major point here, even if I use the euw url of the boards it's the same (would be great if we could have boards sort by language only not region :p)
Interesting, I may just end up escalating this then, it seems like it might be a larger issue than region locking.

I got some info for you aswell. 
At the moment I am on the NA boards, in my browser bar it says boards.na and I can navigate through the boards with the boards bar on the left. 
But on the top left side it says: EU WEST(English). If I use the navigation bar at the top like Boards and then red tracker it will direct me to EU West. 
I manually have to switch the region on the top left to NA even though I am already browsing/writing on the NA boards if I don't want to risk being swapped over to EU WEST if I want to go to the red tracker.

^I can actually add more to this. Another thing, this is also why some people think they are randomly logged out. I remember seeing a post before about the site logging them out and not letting them log back in. Reason for this, is cause they clicked on an EUW boards page, then went back to the NA boards, and it switches to EUW which they are logged out on because wrong server page.

I remember this happening to me a few times, and thought it was a log out bug. When trying to backtrack what happened of why it would do that, I had noticed it said EUW at the top and then realized I had clicked on an EUW link earlier that someone has posted. What I think happens is some people post EUW links, and people don't realize it and click on it, and then the boards switch on them like a ninja. Then they are on EUW boards, and can't login and post and can't figure out why.

I think there should be something stickied about boards secretly switching on them. Something like "Always look at the beginning of the link and if it says EUW or something else, the boards might switch on you" or something.

You wouldn't happen to be browsing any posts on the EUW forums (boards or the old one), would you? That can mess up your region if you have tabs from both regions open.

If you do intend to read posts from both forums, my best advice (besides, get a EUW account and just use it everywhere) is to use a different browser for each forum.
